original: An election is held in $TITLE$.\n
translation: 一场选举正在$TITLE$举行。\n

original: The Anti-Papacy of §Y$ANTIPOPE$§! has ended.
translation: §Y$ANTIPOPE$§!已经不再是对立教宗。

original: Best Claimant
translation: 最佳宣称者

original: Since there are good $RELIGION$ claimants to the Crown of §Y$TITLE$§!, all gained territory will be given to the strongest candidate - currently §Y$RULER$§!. Claimants who contribute to the war are prioritized.
translation: 既然§Y$TITLE$§!的王冠有许多优秀的$RELIGION$宣称者，那么获得的所有领土都会给最有力的候选人——现在是§Y$RULER$§!。对圣战做出贡献的宣称者被优先考虑。

original: Restore the Papacy in Rome
translation: 将教廷迎回罗马

original: The Holy Father has lost control of his secular domain, but it is within my power to restore the Eternal City to him!
translation: 教宗失去了对世俗领地的控制，不过为他夺回永恒之城却是我的分内之事。

original: Restored to Rome
translation: 夺回罗马

original: Created my Office
translation: 建立我的宗教法庭

original: This chivalric order owes its name to Santiago Matamoros, or Saint James the Moorslayer as he is known in other parts of the world. The Order of Santiago enjoys the official sponsorship of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church and its knights have all sworn to purge entire realms of heathens and heretics if so requested by a [Root.Religion.GetName] ruler.
translation: 此骑士团的名称源自圣地亚哥·马塔莫雷斯，或他在世界其他地方的称呼——「摩尔人的屠夫」圣雅各伯。圣地亚哥骑士团受[Root.Religion.GetName]教会的官方资助，而且骑士团中的骑士发誓清洗领地中的所有异教徒和异端，如果[Root.Religion.GetName]统治者要求，他们乐于遵从誓言。

original: The Order of Calatrava is the most recent addition to the soldiers of the Cross, having just been endorsed in a decree issued by the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church. These knights take their name from a castle recovered in Iberia from the clutches of the Moslem infidel, and they stand ready to combat heathens and defend the pious in the name of any [Root.Religion.GetName] ruler who is willing to provide for their upkeep.
translation: 卡拉特拉瓦骑士团是最新加入十字军的成员。刚刚由[Root.Religion.GetName]教会发布的诏书批准成立。这一骑士团的名称源于一座从穆斯林异教徒手中收复的伊比利亚城堡。如果有哪个[Root.Religion.GetName]负担他们部队的维护费，他们就会以其名义与异教徒和异端作战以及保卫虔诚的信徒。

original: A decree has been issued confirming the formation of a new religious military order - the Knights of St. John. The Knights, who have already protected and cared for sick pilgrims in Jerusalem for some time, now have the full weight of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church behind them. Pious [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers may call on their support in wars against heretics and heathens, but they will not fight those of their own faith.
translation: 新的法令已经颁布，确认建立新的宗教军事修会——圣若翰骑士团。这些骑士们保护和照料生病的耶路撒冷朝圣者也有一段时间了，现在他们则有了[Root.Religion.GetName]教会在背后鼎力支持。虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]统治者在与异教徒和异端们交战时可以寻求他们的帮助，不过他们不会与那些和自己信仰相同的人交战。

original: A new Christian military order has been founded by a small group of wealthy knights. The Poor Fellow-Soldiers of Christ and of the Temple of Solomon - or the Knights Templar for short - have sworn to protect pilgrims travelling through the Holy Land. The [Root.Religion.GetName] church fully endorses the Order, and this will allow pious [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers to call on their aid, though they will only fight against heretics and infidels.
translation: 一小群富有的骑士建立了一个新的基督教军事兄弟会。基督和所罗门圣殿的贫苦骑士团（简称为圣殿骑士团）已宣誓保护前往圣地的朝圣者。[Root.Religion.GetName]完全支持这一骑士团。尽管团里的骑士们只与异教徒和异端作战，但[Root.Religion.GetName]统治者还是可以向他们寻求帮助。

original: The Order of Brothers of the German House of Saint Mary in Jerusalem has been formed, sponsored by the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church and the Holy Roman Emperor. The Teutonic Order, much like the Knights of St. John and the Knights Templar, primarily protect and care for pilgrims to the Holy Land, but will serve any [Root.Religion.GetName] ruler willing to pay for their upkeep. Being a religious order, they will only fight against heretics and infidels.
translation: 耶路撒冷的德意志弟兄圣母骑士团在[Root.Religion.GetName]教会和神圣罗马帝国皇帝的资助下建立了。条顿骑士团和圣若翰骑士团以及圣殿骑士团类似，主要是为了保护和照料前往圣地的朝圣者。不过只要任何[Root.Religion.GetName]愿意为该骑士团支付部队保养费，他们就会为其效劳。作为一个军事修会，他们只愿与异教徒与异端作战。

original: The Knights of Saint Anthony come from one of the oldest chivalric orders in the world. In 370, disciples of Anthony the Hermit founded the Order of Saint Anthony under the patronage of the Emperor of Ethiopia.\n\nAlthough they have kept a low profile for many centuries, this holy order has now resurfaced as a powerful force. Their stated purpose is to protect [Root.Religion.GetName] Christians from all those who would seek them harm, and to purge the land of infidels and heretics wherever they may be found.
translation: 圣安东尼骑士团是世界上最早的骑士团之一。公元370年，隐修士安东尼的各位门徒在埃塞俄比亚皇帝资助下成立了圣安东尼骑士团。\n\n尽管他们几百年来一直保持低调，但是现在，这个圣骑士团又以强大的姿态重现在世人面前。他们宣布宗旨是保护所有的[Root.Religion.GetName]基督徒免受伤害。此外，只要该团一发现异教徒和异端的踪影，该团就会对他们进行清洗。

original: Some of Persia's finest warriors have taken it upon themselves to found a new holy order dedicated to safeguarding the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. They call themselves the Immortals, just like the ancient Persian warrior elite described by Herodotus, and they seem intent on carrying on the martial traditions of their legendary predecessors.\n\nThis militant holy order has sworn to fight against all who would threaten the legacy of Zoroaster, and to never again allow Zoroastrianism to suffer the reverses it did in the wake of the Arab conquests of the 7th century.
translation: 一些波斯的优秀战士自发建立了旨在为捍卫[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰而献身的新教团。他们称自己为长生军，就像希罗多德描述的古波斯精英战士那样。他们似乎打算发扬他们那些有着传奇色彩的先祖们的军事传统。\n\n这一军事教团宣誓要与所有威胁琐罗亚斯德的遗产之人作战，而且不会让祆教重蹈七世纪时在阿拉伯对外征服战争中一败涂地的覆辙。

original: A Sufi sect of dervishes has arisen under the leadership of a certain Hadji Baktash Wali, a mystic from Khorasan. Striving for 'Unity of Being', Bektashis train the soul through meditation and contemplation of the inner meaning of the Koran. The Bektashi Order is warlike and especially popular among [Root.Religion.GetName] Muslim soldiers. The Order has sworn to protect Islam and to combat infidels and polytheists of all kinds.
translation: 一群属于苏菲派的德尔维希托钵僧在一位来自呼罗珊的名为哈吉·拜克塔什·瓦里的神秘主义者的领导下崛起。为「万物合一」而不懈奋斗的同时，拜克塔什教团通过冥想和思索古兰经教义的隐藏含义来磨练自己的灵魂。拜克塔什教团十分好战，而且在[Root.Religion.GetName]穆斯林士兵中尤其受欢迎。拜克塔什教团宣誓捍卫伊斯兰教并与各种各样的异端和多神教徒作战。

original: Word is spreading that a [Root.Religion.GetName] missionary, Hassan-i Sabbah, has founded a religious order known as the 'Hashshashin' somewhere in western Persia. Using trickery and guile, this mysterious cult of trained killers has seized control of the mountain fortress of Alamut and converted it into their headquarters. Already a string of violent murders can be traced back to Hassan's devoted and fearless disciples...
translation: 有个消息流传甚广：一位[Root.Religion.GetName]宣教士哈桑·伊本·萨巴哈已在西波斯某处成立一个新的名为阿萨辛派的教团。通过使用各类欺诈手段，这伙神秘的，由训练有素的杀手组成的狂热分子已经占领了阿拉木图的山间要塞，并把该地设为他们教团的总部。只有小部分残暴的凶徒能够成为哈桑无私的和无畏的信徒……

original: Donate 300¤ to the Hashshashins
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给阿萨辛派

original: Donate money to the Hashshashins in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName].
translation: 捐钱给阿萨辛派来换取[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]。

original: Donate 300¤ to the Bektashi
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给拜克塔什教团

original: Donate money to the Bektashi in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName].
translation: 捐钱给拜克塔什教团来换取[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]。

original: Donate 300¤ to the Templars
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给圣殿骑士团

original: Donate money to the Knights Templar in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给圣殿骑士团来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Knights Hospitaller in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给医院骑士团来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Teutonic Order in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给条顿骑士团来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Knights of Santiago in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给圣地亚哥骑士团来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Knights of Calatrava in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给卡拉特拉瓦骑士团来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Brotherhood of the Holy Sepulchre in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给圣墓兄弟会来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Order of Saint Anthony in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给圣安东尼骑士团来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Immortals in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 捐钱给长生军来换取虔诚度和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我终生的尊重。

original: Donate money to the Zealots in exchange for [Root.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Priesthood.
translation: 捐钱给奋锐党来换取[Root.Religion.GetPietyName]和[Root.Religion.GetName]祭司们对我终生的尊重。

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will aid us greatly in our continued defense of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful! You have my friendship, as well as that of the priesthood.

By Zoroaster's will,
Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您极其慷慨的捐赠将会对我们忠诚地捍卫[Root.Religion.GetName]大有裨益！您将收获我以及祭司的友谊。

以琐罗亚斯德之意志，
大团长[From.GetFirstName]

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will aid us greatly in our continued defense of Jerusalem, the Third Temple and the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith! You have my friendship, as well as that of the priesthood.

Remember Masada!
Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您极其慷慨的捐赠将会对我们保卫耶路撒冷、第三圣殿以及捍卫[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰大有裨益！您将收获我，连同祭司的友谊。

勿忘马萨达！
大团长[From.GetFirstName]

original: This character will not contribute to decadence in his dynasty.
translation: 此角色不是造成其家族衰落的罪魁祸首。

original: Claim
translation: 宣称

original: Request a Claim on this Title
translation: 请求对此头衔进行宣称

original: §RNot possible to Usurp County rank Titles outside your Realm
translation: §R不可能篡夺你领地之外的伯爵级别头衔

original: §RNot possible to Usurp Barony rank Titles
translation: §R不可能篡夺男爵头衔

original: §RCannot Usurp Titles in your own Realm without a Strong Claim!
translation: §R若没有强有力的宣称，不能篡夺你领地中的头衔！

original: §RThe new Primary Title has to be the same Rank as the previous one!
translation: §R新的主要头衔必须和前一个属于同一级别

original: This is Already your Primary Title!
translation: 这已经是你的主要头衔！

original: §RCannot set your Primary Title to a Patrician Settlement!
translation: §R不能把你的主要头衔设在为贵人领地上！

original: Asked for Claim
translation: 要求宣称

original: §GThis Request would be Accepted§!
translation: §G该请求将会被接受§!

original: §YThis Request might be Accepted§!
translation: §Y该请求有可能被接受§!

original: §RThis Request would be Denied§!
translation: §R该请求不会被接受§!

original: Hymns of Abraham
translation: 亚伯拉罕颂歌

original: Warriors of Faith Unit Pack
translation: 信仰之战士单元包

original: Military Orders Unit Pack
translation: 骑士团单元包

original: Revoke the title of §Y$TITLE$§! from §Y$HOLDER$§!
translation: 从§Y$HOLDER$§!处剥夺头衔§Y$TITLE$§!

original: Title is not the Primary Title
translation: 该头衔不是主要头衔

original: Can afford to lose §Y$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige
translation: 可以承受§Y$PRESTIGE$§!威望值的损失

original: Succession type is not Gavelkind
translation: 继承法类型不是均分继承法

original: Rabbi
translation: 拉比

original: Kohen
translation: 柯亨

original: Rabban
translation: 拉班

original: Nasi
translation: 纳西
